numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The title is: Losing Optimism As You Get Older (Charlie, Linnea, Amy).
2. We notice that people who are 15-24 years old are more optimistic.
3. We notice that people who are 40 years old are less optimistic.
4. Indonesia has the highest population among all countries.
5. Brazil is the lowest in one category.
6. Mali is the lowest in another category.
7. We wonder what makes younger people think more positively about the world.
8. We wonder why the older generation thinks negatively about the world.
9. We wonder what older people see as negative about the world.
10. We wonder what younger people see as positive about the world.
11. We are part of the group of people who are 15-24 years old.
12. We think that this fact affects us.
